divs: Sighting DetailsMY WIFE AND I FIXED COOFFE AND WENT OUTSIDE ONTO THE PATIO LIKE EVERY OTHER SUMMER MORNING. AFTER ABOUT 5 MIN. MY WIFE SAID, WHAT IS THAT. I LOOKED UP AND IMMEDIATELY SAW WHAT SHE WAS TALKING ABOUT. I DIDNT ANSWER BECAUSE I DIDNT KNOW, SHE ASK AGAIN. I TOLD HER I DIDNT KNOW. WE VIEWED IN AMAZEMENT AS THIS ROUND BRIGHT LIGHT WITH NO SOUND DISAPPEERD OVER THE TOP OF THE HOUSE. THERE WAS NO SOUND AT ALL. I HAVE BEEN IN AROUND AIRCRAFT ALL MY LIFE. MY WIFE AND REGURALY LOOK AT THE STARS AND AIRCRAFT IN THE NIGHT SKY. THIS WAS THE FIRST TIME WE HAVE NEVER BEEN ABLE TO IDENTIFY. I WISHED I HAD RAN AROUND THE HOUSE TO CONTINUE TO WATCH THE FLIGHT BUT I GUESS WE WERE SOMEWHAT DUMBFOUNDED AT THE TIME.
Summary: BRIGHT WHITE ROUND LIGHT NO SOUND APP. 1000 FT.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Athens
There were no other sightings in Athens on or around July 20th 2011
